mapper.insert: insert into video_info(id, name, category, time, introduction, is_necessarily, url) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{category}, #{time}, #{introduction}, #{isNecessarily}, #{url})
mapper.update: update video_info set name = #{name}, category = #{category}, time = #{time}, introduction = #{introduction}, is_necessarily = #{isNecessarily}, url = #{url} where id = #{id}
